{"id": "31627", "title": "Bug 31627: DBCS perspective change causes core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace", "description": "Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver. : IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3

Summary:
DBCS: Perspective change causes core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace

Description:
Steps to recreate the problem:
1. <Steps to recreate the problem here>

OB: Bug 31627: DBCS perspective change causes core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace
EB: Clicking the 'Resource Perspective' icon in the shortcut bar causes a core dump in the workbench.
After step 12, the workbench crashes (refer to the attachment 'cvsdefect.zip').

SR: The perspective should change successfully without causing a core dump."}
